titleStmt.title: The history of Olivaires of Castile, and Arthur of Dalgarve. Translated out of the Spanish into the Italian tongue, by Francesco Portonari: and from the italian made English. Licens'd, Feb. 1. 1694/5.
titleStmt.author: Portonari, Francesco fl. 1552-1578.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Fra. Hildyard bookseller in York,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
